verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Touch Your people once again
With Your precious holy hand, we pray.
Let Your kingdom shine upon this earth
Through a living glorious church,
Not for temporary deeds,
But to restore authority and power.
Let a mighty rushing wind blow in.
Touch Your people once again.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We need wisdom; we need power,
And true love for each other.
We have had so many big but empty words.
So we come before Your face,
Asking for Your grace.
Bring Your people to a state of kingdom life.
Restore Your church again.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lord You see Your tired servants.
And Your broken, wounded soldiers.
O, how much we need Your precious healing hand.
We need the power of Your cross,
As the only source for us.
As we stand up, facing final battle cry,
Restore Your church again.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Sabiduría necesitamos y amor verdadero
Hemos tenido tantas palabras de vanidad
Henos aquí, oh Señor, pidiendo tu gracia
A tu pueblo trae la vida del reino
Restáuranos Señor.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Toca a tu pueblo otra vez, pon tu mano de poder, Señor
Brille tu reino en esta tierra, por tu iglesia eficaz
No por hecho temporal, mas poder y autoridad,
Restaurar, que un viento recio sople,
Toca a tu pueblo otra vez.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Señor tu ves a los quebrantados y a muchos heridos
Necesitamos tu mano de sanidad
Necesitamos la cruz como fuente de salud
Estando firmes con el grito de batalla
Restáuranos Señor.
